20101202025420.333|20101202025421.167|CCO|    
20101202025421.167|20101202025422.000|CCO|      improve lung function.
20101202025422.000|20101202025422.833|CCO|  While nothing can reverse COPD,

20101202025428.667|20101202025429.500|CCO|

20101202025432.000|20101202025432.833|CCO|

20101202025433.667|20101202025434.500|CCO|
20101202025434.500|20101202025435.333|CCO|      to help you breathe better.
20101202025435.333|20101202025436.167|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101202025436.167|20101202025437.000|CCO|
20101202025437.000|20101202025437.833|CCO|    inhalers for sudden symptoms

20101202025439.500|20101202025440.333|CCO|
20101202025440.333|20101202025441.167|CCO|      used more than twice a day.
